subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Blue Jays kept firing baseballs at will up the gut of the Mets’ defense in Toronto at one of the two ballparks in the majors that have AstroTurf.
snippet: The Blue Jays kept firing baseballs at will up the gut of the Mets’ defense in Toronto at one of the two ballparks in the majors that have AstroTurf.
